notes: Creatures made of fire. Because of their strong attacks, they are often used by [[Player Killer]]s. With two Fire Elemental's [[Summon]]ed and a mage's [[Sudden Death]] attack they can surprise even an experienced adventurer, so be prepared if you notice a player with these summoned, especially with a [[Skull System|skull]]. If you are a [[knight]] with high [[hitpoints]], you could try to not kill summons first, but instead go for the summoner making the Fire Elementals also hit their owner.
name: Fire Elemental
bestiarytext: Fire Elementals are entities consisting only of fire. They have been spotted in the wake of demons, and nobody knows whether they are summoned by them or whether they are independent creatures rising out of fire. They are very dangerous fighters and create fire fields or shoot fireballs at their opponents.
behaviour: Fire elementals can deal deadly combinations so kill them fast.
location: [[Cyclopolis]], [[Hero Cave]] in [[Edron]], [[Ankrahmun]] tombs, [[Serpentine Tower]], [[Factory Quarter]] in [[Yalahar]], [[Deeper Banuta]], [[Goroma]] inside the volcano and beneath [[Fenrock]].
strategy: Kill them quickly before they can deliver too much damage. It is recommended to run towards them, since they do their distance attacks less often.
